emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Code Development
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously writing, testing, and deploying software from high-level requirements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces human error in coding, increases productivity but might lead to job displacement in programming roles.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires advanced AI algorithms, trust in AI's decision-making, and robust security measures for code integrity.

emerging_technologies.name: Neuralink-Style Brain-Computer Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Invasive or non-invasive brain interfaces allowing control of devices or computers directly through thought.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances human capabilities but raises significant ethical concerns around privacy, autonomy, and identity.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Public acceptance, regulatory approval, and overcoming technical challenges in biocompatibility and signal interpretation.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Utilization of quantum computing principles to enhance blockchain security, scalability, and speed.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize data security but also poses risks if quantum computers decrypt current blockchain systems.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Maturity of quantum computing, integration into existing blockchain networks, and overcoming quantum-resistant cryptography.

emerging_technologies.name: Space-Based Solar Power Farms
emerging_technologies.description: Large solar panels in space to collect solar power and beam it back to Earth for consumption.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Provides clean, limitless energy but involves high initial costs and environmental considerations in space.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological breakthroughs in wireless power transmission, space logistics, and international cooperation.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Air Mobility
emerging_technologies.description: Drones and flying taxis for urban transport, reducing road congestion and improving travel times.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could transform urban landscapes but requires new infrastructure, safety regulations, and public acceptance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory frameworks, battery technology, AI for navigation, and urban integration planning.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools that work alongside developers in real-time, offering suggestions, debugging, and code completion.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread in tech companies, with significant improvements in coding efficiency and quality.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Energy Grids
mainstream_technologies.description: Grid systems integrated with AI for energy distribution optimization and resilience.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Implemented in several developed nations, aiding in sustainable energy management.

epoch_themes.description: Technological advancements aimed at reducing environmental impact and enhancing energy efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes environmental consciousness and shifts towards sustainable practices.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased governmental policies for carbon reduction, corporate responsibility, and consumer demand for green products.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of autonomous systems in everyday life, from transport to home automation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Alters job markets, enhances safety, and changes human interaction with technology.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing acceptance of autonomous vehicles, regulatory frameworks to manage AI ethics, and public education on AI.

epoch_themes.description: Advancements in technologies that merge human capabilities with machines.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for cognitive enhancement but raises issues of privacy, consent, and the essence of human identity.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased research in neuroscience, ethical debates, and a push for international standards on brain-computer interfaces.
